column3: "Incorporated suggested changes from @ryanofsky." doesn't belong in the commit description (it will ping him every time the commit goes somewhere..)\n
Agree. Also please don't put irrelevant information in the commit subject line. \n

Should probably drop the isNull check because a value can't be both a string and a null at the same time.

Also maybe drop the parens around && conditions (searching for "&&" in this file shows no parens used in the other cases).
I think looking at the generated JSON here instead of the script object itself is a bit confusing, but I tend to agree it's the best way to go here to not have to repeat `ExtractDestinations`.\n
